name.jp: リスターテル(イベント)
name.th: รีเซ็ต Stat (อีเวนต์)

description.en: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ar: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.br: Item de evento que reembolsa todos os seus pontos de atributos. Aplica-se apenas à sua página de atributos atual.
description.cns: 可以重置属性点，仅对当前属性页有效。
description.de: Event Item, das deine Stats zurücksetzt. Gilt nur für die aktuelle Stat Seite.
description.fi: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fil: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fr: Parchemin permettant de redistribuer une fois tous les points de statistiques de la page actuelle.
description.id: Event item yang menyetel ulang statistik anda. Hanya berlaku untuk halaman stat anda saat ini.
description.it: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.jp: ステータスをリセットするイベントアイテムです。現在のステータスページにのみ適用されます。
description.kr: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.nl: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.pl: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ru: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.sp: Objeto de evento que resetea tus estadísticas. Solo se aplica a sus estadísticas actuales.
description.sw: Event item that resets your stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.th: ไอเทมกิจกรรมที่รีเซ็ตstatของคุณ มีผลกับหน้า Stat ปัจจุบันเท่านั้น
description.tw: 重置您的數值的活動道具。 僅適用於您當前的統計頁面。
description.vi: Event item thiết lập lại stats. Chỉ áp dụng cho trang stat hiện tại của bạn.
